metadata.caption: John J. Audubon (American, 1785-1851). Purple Grackle, 1827-1838. Black-ink etching, aquatint and engraving toned by hand with opaque and transparent watercolors, Sheet: 38 1/4 x 25 1/2 in. (97.2 x 64.8 cm). Brooklyn Museum, Gift of the estate of Emily Winthrop Miles, 64.98.12
